attributes.action: Educate and protect young girls from grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details:
It is a well known fact that young victims of child grooming gangs are on the rise in the UK. To make an effort to prevent young girls being targeted by these gangs, we need to ensure they are well educated about the dangers of grooming gangs and are properly protected by the justice system.

Too many children that are targeted by grooming gangs are completely oblivious to the fact that they are at risk and in danger due to the lack of education in this crucial subject.
